answers.answer: I know with age comes a better chance of having a baby with down syndrome...and the high blood pressure can turn into preeclampsia

I don't know that you need to worry about anything but I thought you might be interested in this other forum too...http://www.medhelp.org/forums/Pregnancy-35/show/89It's for pregnancy 35+My midwife just has her 4th child at 46 and he is perfect! Best wishes to you!

question: what kind of problems do i need to worry about being 45 and pregant and have high blood pressure?
title: pregant at 45
